name: my n0ts's dotfiles
body:
### Welcome to my Naoya Nakazawa (aka n0ts) dotfiles.

### Support OS
OSX Lion 10.7 or later
Linux (mostly CentOS 5 or later / SL 5 or later / Ubuntu 11 or later)
FreeBSD 8.x or later

### Installation
```
 $ cd dotfiles
 $ make
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
